debug module¶

This module defines a wrapper for functions, printing the function name, arguments and return value

debug.optional_debug(orig_func)[source]¶

A wrapper that forces a print of a formatted signature if DEBUG is set to true

debug.print_signature(function, args, kwargs)[source]¶
Prints a string of format
function_name(arg1, arg2, kwarg1 = , kwarg = 2)
